summary: An escort who caters to Washington, D.C.'s society ladies becomes involved in a murder case.
cast: Woody Harrelson|Kristin Scott Thomas|Lauren Bacall|Ned Beatty|Moritz Bleibtreu|Mary Beth Hurt|Lily Tomlin|Willem Dafoe|William Hope|Geff Francis|Steven Hartley|Garrick Hagon|Michael J. Reynolds|Allen Lidkey|Stewart Alexander|Andres Williams|Jason Durran|Marcello Cabezas|Michael Ahl|Paul Beckett|Kelvin Cook|Patricia DiZebba|Pamela Fischer|Lynn-Jane Foreman|Simon Hepworth|Christian Jones|Jeff Leslie|Vito Pietanza|Tina Simmons|Anastasia Summers|Schuster Vance|Linda E. Williams
title: The Walker
